derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (in the sense 'beak, nose'): probably from Middle Dutch nib or Middle Low German nibbe, variant of nebbe 'beak' (see neb)

entry.def: A nib is a pointed piece of metal at the end of some pens, which controls the flow of ink as you write.

means.word_mean: 1. the writing point of a pen
2. horny projecting mouth of a bird
